entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of plug-in Validate EFM successful, version 1.21.1. - validate/EFM
[info] Activation of plug-in Inline XBRL Document Set successful, version 1.1. - inlineXbrlDocumentSet

[DQR.IFRS.0102.9543] Gesamtergebnis with a value of 505,300,000 is not equal to the combined total of Gewinn (Verlust) and Sonstiges Ergebnis ( 475,900,000 + 29,300,000 ) with a value of 505,200,000.
These values should be equal. The properties of this ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncome fact are: Period :2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of Gesamtergebnis : 1 Decimals of Gewinn (Verlust) : 1 Decimals of Sonstiges Ergebnis : 1
Rule Element Id:9543 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/529900ICA8XQYGIKR372/2021-12-31/ESEF/AT/0/bawagpskbank-2021-12-31-de.zip/bawagpskbank-2021-12-31-de/reports/bawagpskbank-2021-12-31-de.xhtml 2956

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 01 - Gewinn (Verlust) but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. bawagpskbank:AdministrativeExpenses, ifrs-full:ImpairmentLossImpairmentGainAndReversalOfImpairmentLossDeterminedInAccordanceWithIFRS9, ifrs-full:OtherExpenseByNature, bawagpskbank:RiskCosts, ifrs-full:GainsArisingFromDerecognitionOfFinancialAssetsMeasuredAtAmortisedCost, ifrs-full:OtherIncome, ifrs-full:LossesArisingFromDerecognitionOfFinancialAssetsMeasuredAtAmortisedCost, ifrs-full:OperatingExpense, ifrs-full:DepreciationAndAmortisationExpense, ifrs-full:ShareOfProfitLossOfAssociatesAndJointVenturesAccountedForUsingEquityMethod, ifrs-full:InterestRevenueCalculatedUsingEffectiveInterestMethod, ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests, bawagpskbank:GainsAndLossesOnFinancialAssetsAndLiabilities All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -
